abstract: Romain Grosjean wins Belgian Grand Prix in Spa-Francorchamps; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hunter-Reay won the crash-filled IndyCar race which left Justin Wilson in a coma and critical condition when he was hit in the head by a piece of debris.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Auto Racing; Podium Finish for Grosjean

snippet: Hunter-Reay won the crash-filled IndyCar race which left Justin Wilson in a coma and critical condition when he was hit in the head by a piece of debris.
